parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>False. There is no CMF number present in the provided post.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>False. The post does not refer to any parliamentary candidate by name, surname, or any other clear identifier.  It focuses on an educational event organized by "Romania Eficienta" with the support of the Ministry of Energy.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>True. The post is a paid Facebook advertisement, inherently designed to reach a wide audience. The content describes an event targeting schoolchildren, but the advertisement itself aims for broader visibility.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>False. The objective of the post is to promote an educational event focused on energy efficiency, not to influence votes in the parliamentary elections. There is no mention of any political party or candidate, nor any call to action related to voting.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>True. The post can be considered a form of citizen journalism, reporting on a public event with educational value. It provides information about the event, its participants, and its purpose, without advocating for any particular political stance or candidate.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>Not applicable. The post doesn't express personal opinions; it reports factual information about a public event.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>1295517918131552</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post promotes an educational event on energy efficiency, organized by "Romania Eficienta" with support from the Ministry of Energy.  The content is factual, reporting on a public event and its educational impact on schoolchildren.  It does not mention any political party, candidate, or advocate for any particular voting choice.  The paid advertisement format aims for broad reach, but the content itself is devoid of any electoral propaganda.  The timing of the post, even if after the official campaign period, is irrelevant because the content is not related to electoral campaigning.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>FALSE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates/>
<responsible-party-or-group>Romania Eficienta</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police/>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
